Features.label: Features
Features.title: Everything You Need
Features.subtitle: A complete business toolkit for freelancers and small businesses.

feature1.title: Customer Management
feature1.description: Manage your customers centrally. Store contact details, addresses, and notes in one place.

feature2.title: Create Quotes
feature2.description: Create professional quotes with automatic numbering and PDF export.

feature3.title: Invoices
feature3.description: Convert quotes to invoices with one click. Automatic calculation of taxes and totals.

feature4.title: Dynamic QR Codes
feature4.description: Create QR codes with stable links. Change the destination anytime without reprinting the QR code.

feature5.title: PDF Export
feature5.description: Generate professional PDFs for all your documents. Perfect for emailing.

feature6.title: Scan Tracking
feature6.description: Track QR code scans with detailed analytics and location data (Pro feature).

empower.title: Everything in One Tool
empower.description: Cenety is your complete business toolkit for freelancers and local businesses. Manage customers, create quotes and invoices, and use dynamic QR codes – all in one place.

collaborative.title: CRM Light
collaborative.description: Manage your customers simply and efficiently.

innovative.title: Quotes & Invoices
innovative.description: Create professional documents with PDF export.

scalable.title: Dynamic QR Codes
scalable.description: QR codes with stable links but editable destinations.

integration.title: Professional & Simple
integration.description: Cenety combines professional features with an intuitive user interface. Perfect for freelancers and small businesses looking to optimize their business processes.

flexible.title: Fast
flexible.description: Create quotes and invoices in minutes, not hours.

reliable.title: Flexible
reliable.description: Dynamic QR codes that you can adjust anytime.

Terms.metaDescription: Terms and conditions for using Cenety services
Terms.title: Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Terms of Use
section1.content: By accessing this website, you are agreeing to be bound by these terms of service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws.

section2.title: 2. Use License
section2.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on Cenety's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.

section3.title: 3. Disclaimer
section3.content: The materials on Cenety's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Cenety makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

section4.title: 4. Limitations
section4.content: In no event shall Cenety or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Cenety's website, even if Cenety or a Cenety authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

lastUpdated.title: Last Updated
lastUpdated.content: These terms and conditions were last updated on June 1, 2023.

Privacy.metaDescription: GDPR compliant privacy policy for Cenety services
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: We collect information to provide better services to all our users. The information we collect includes basic account information such as your name and email address, as well as usage data related to your interactions with our services.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, protect, and improve our services, to develop new ones, and to protect Cenety and our users. We also use this information to offer you tailored content and to improve your overall experience.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content: We do not share personal information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Cenety except in the following cases: with your consent, for external processing, for legal reasons, or in case of a merger or acquisition.

section4.title: 4. Your Rights
section4.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your data. You may also have the right to receive a copy of your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

lastUpdated.title: Last Updated
lastUpdated.content: This Privacy Policy was last updated on June 1, 2023.

Imprint.title: Imprint
Imprint.subtitle: Information according to § 5 TMG (German Telemedia Act)

responsible.title: Responsible for Content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV

dispute.title: EU Dispute Resolution
dispute.euPlatform: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):
dispute.participation: We are not willing or obligated to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

liability.title: Liability for Content and Links
liability.contentText: As a service provider, we are liable for own contents of these websites according to Sec. 7, paragraph 1 German Telemedia Act (TMG). However, according to Sec. 8 to 10 German Telemedia Act (TMG), service providers are not obligated to permanently monitor submitted or stored information or to search for evidences that indicate illegal activities.
liability.linksText: Our offer includes links to external third party websites. We have no influence on the contents of those websites, therefore we cannot guarantee for those contents. Providers or administrators of linked websites are always responsible for their own contents.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.text: The content and works published on this website underlie the German copyright law. Any kind of duplication, processing, distribution or any kind of utilization beyond the scope of copyright law shall require the prior written consent of the author or originator in question.

CookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to provide you with the best possible user experience. Some are technically necessary, others help us improve our website.
CookieConsent.necessaryDescription: These cookies are required for the basic functions of the website and cannot be deactivated.
CookieConsent.analyticsDescription: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
CookieConsent.marketingDescription: Used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user.

CTA.title: Ready to Optimize Your Business?
CTA.description: Start today and manage your entire business from one place.

Offerings.title: What We Offer
Offerings.subtitle: A complete business toolkit with all the features you need

offering1.title: Customer Management (CRM)
offering1.description: Manage all your customer relationships in one central place
offering1.feature1: Central customer database with all contact information
offering1.feature2: Notes and interaction history per customer
offering1.feature3: Quick search and filtering by various criteria

offering2.title: Quotes & Invoices
offering2.feature2: Professional PDF generation with your branding
offering2.feature3: Convert quotes to invoices with one click

offering3.title: Dynamic QR Codes
offering3.description: QR codes with stable links but editable destinations
offering3.feature1: Create QR codes with permanent links
offering3.feature2: Change the destination anytime without reprinting
offering3.feature3: Tracking and analytics for each QR code (Pro)

offering4.title: Analytics & Reporting
offering4.description: Keep track of your business performance
offering4.feature1: Detailed statistics on documents and customers
offering4.feature2: QR code scan tracking with location data

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Get started with your optimized business in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Sign up for free and create your account in less than a minute. No credit card required.

step2.title: Add Customers
step2.description: Start entering your customers. Import existing data or add new customers manually.

step3.title: Create Documents
step3.description: Create your first quote or invoice. Use our templates or customize everything to your needs.

step4.title: Optimize Business
step4.description: Use analytics and reporting to optimize and grow your business. Track all important metrics.

benefit1.title: Time Saving
benefit1.description: Automate recurring tasks and save hours per week

benefit2.title: Professional
benefit2.description: Create professional documents that reflect your brand

benefit3.title: Centralized
benefit3.description: Everything in one place – no need for multiple tools

benefit4.title: GDPR Compliant
benefit4.description: Your data is secure and meets the highest privacy standards

benefit5.title: Scalable
benefit5.description: Grows with your business – from individuals to teams

benefit6.title: Support
benefit6.description: Our team is always available to help you

q1.question: How does customer management work?
q1.answer: Our customer management allows you to store all contact information, addresses, notes, and interaction history of your customers in one central location. You can quickly search, filter, and see all important information at a glance.

q2.question: Can I convert quotes to invoices?
q2.answer: Yes, absolutely! With a single click, you can convert any quote into an invoice. All data is automatically transferred, and you only need to adjust the invoice number.

q3.question: How do dynamic QR codes work?
q3.answer: Dynamic QR codes have a permanent link, but the destination can be changed at any time. This means you don't need to reprint the QR code if the target URL changes. Perfect for marketing materials that are used for longer periods.

q4.question: Is my data secure?
q4.answer: Absolutely! We use state-of-the-art encryption technologies and are fully GDPR compliant. Your data is stored securely and never shared with third parties.

q5.question: Is there a free trial?
q5.answer: Yes, you can try Cenety free for 14 days. No credit card required. After the trial period, you can choose from various plans that fit your business.

q6.question: Can I export my data?
q6.answer: Yes, you can export all your data at any time. We offer export functions for customers, documents, and all other data in various formats (CSV, PDF, JSON).
